content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://static.zdassets.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com; frame-ancestors 'self';
